mapper.insert: insert into tbl_kcal (kno, k_name, k_time, kcal, k_dgree, k_notes, k_pic) values (seq_kcal_kno.nextval, #{k_name}, #{k_time}, #{kcal}, #{k_dgree}, #{k_notes}, #{k_pic, jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update: update tbl_kcal set k_name = #{k_name}, k_time = #{k_time}, kcal = #{kcal}, k_dgree = #{k_dgree}, k_notes = #{k_notes}, k_pic = #{k_pic, jdbcType=VARCHAR} where kno = #{kno}
mapper.select: select * from (select rownum rnum, a.* from (select * from tbl_kcal order by kno desc) a) where rnum between #{startRow} and #{endRow}
